text: @piersmorgan What Covid19 Test did you have? RT PCR? If so a Negative Test means nothing - in early days of infection there may be too little viral RNA to be detected. An Antibody Test? A Negative Test may also mean you're infected but NOT YET developed antibodies. Trust Scientists to know

domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings
